message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its worth to you is $15,000.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. It's still a great deal for you, but I need to make sure I'm getting the best price for my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $11,000 is tempting, I'm hoping we can find a middle ground. I'm willing to lower my price to $12,000. This would still give you a good deal while ensuring I can make a fair profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
